column5: Things have been pretty heavy on WC lately, what with the Duluth floods and the flap about resorts being closed or not closed, that I thought a little levity might be in order:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=10lLP...eature=related I can hardly argue with the logic, and my car and boat will be similarly stocked when I head to Lac Seul in 10 days!!! Keep smiling', fellas! Bill
Lol. I am thinking there's a lot else going on there. Maybe he has some stomach issues, who knows.I do carry wipes though for a variety of uses.
That right there is funny!! UMMMM...Honey could you turn around while I do a maintenance wipe,I wonder if he has any anti monkey butt powder?
The job isn't finished till the paperwork is done. But, this guy seems anal. I also carry a roll of TP in the boat at all times.

I think this is hilarious and I am sure it will lead to some stories....like the time I wish I had the huggies, partner nosed the boat into an island and I got rid of the last night before's sins. I also left a once clean tshirt under a rock on that island and thought about the need for a maintenance wipe the rest of the day! If you found something like that in NW Ontario and can tell me the logo on the tshirt I will send you fifty bucks! Ha ha!
We really didn't need to know that, lol.
Looks like a good topic for Larry the Cable guy to comment on.
Yeah, I found your shirt. I found it under the rock when I slipped in for a maintenance wipe. (hope you don't mind that I reused it) Here it is!
